body_html:
I played around with some approaches only touching code in gpu_init.cc and gpu_device.cc and got it so that it didn't establish a context on a device that wasn't in gpu_device_list. The only implication is that once established, I don't think we could de-establish it. That is, if you started with gpu_device_list="0,1" but then closed that session and reopened it with "1", I'm pretty sure 0 would still have the context established.

But I think we could do it so that if you did "0", it would only establish on 0, and in the same process, you could probably then add "0,1" in another session and it might still work. Would that satisfy your requirements?
